about_the_game: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon. Those who enlisted early can use this to fight while feeling like a legend. Now, go and save our Earth!
